change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 2/2013, effective January 16, 2013.

section.sectiontext: The South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority established under the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act is a prescribed entity for the purpose of the definition of "entity" in section 1 of the Police Act.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 61/2016, effective March 2, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority
bcl:section.bcl:text: Each of the following is prescribed as an entity for the purposes of paragraph (d) of the definition of "entity" in section 1 of the Police Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority established under the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act;
TransLink Security Management Ltd., a subsidiary of the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority established under the South Coast British Columbia Transportation Authority Act.
